Trial_Design.evidence: Patients between June 2014 and October 2020 with LARC within 12 cm from the anal verge and uninvolved MRF were randomly assigned

Participants.evidence: Patients between June 2014 and October 2020 with LARC within 12 cm from the anal verge and uninvolved MRF

Intervention.evidence: randomly assigned to nCT group with 4 cycles of CAPOX... or nCRT group with Capecitabine 825 mg/m² twice daily administered orally and concurrently with radiation therapy

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary end point is local-regional recurrence-free survival

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of the 663 initially enrolled patients, 589 received the allocated treatment (nCT, n=300; nCRT, n=289)

Number_Analysed.evidence: 589 received the allocated treatment (nCT, n=300; nCRT, n=289)

Result_Outcome.evidence: Pathologic complete response rate was 11.0% (95% CI, 7.8-15.3%) in the nCT arm and 13.8% (95% CI, 10.1-18.5%) in the nCRT arm ( P =0.33)
